statements: SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM borrowers WHERE financial_stability > 0;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM borrowers WHERE financial_stability IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE repayment_history < 1000;
SELECT borrower_name FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM borrowers WHERE repayment_history > 500 ORDER BY borrower_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE financial_stability IS NOT NULL AND repayment_history > 1000
SELECT borrower_name, financial_stability, repayment_history FROM borrowers ORDER BY financial_stability DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM borrowers ORDER BY financial_stability ASC, repayment_history DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM borrower_ratings;
SELECT borrower_id, repayment_history, financial_stability FROM borrower_ratings;
SELECT borrower_id, financial_stability FROM borrower_ratings WHERE repayment_history > 3;
SELECT borrower_id, financial_stability, AVG(repayment_history) AS avg_repayment FROM borrower_ratings GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM repayment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT borrower_id, repayment_history, financial_stability FROM borrower_ratings WHERE repayment_history > 7 ORDER BY financial_stability DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM repayment_history GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_paid > 500;
SELECT * FROM borrower_ratings WHERE borrower_id IN (SELECT borrower_id FROM repayment_history WHERE amount_paid > 1000);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_borrowers, AVG(financial_stability) AS avg_stability FROM borrower_ratings;
SELECT * FROM repayment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount_paid DESC, payment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Ratings ORDER BY date_issued DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM Reviews WHERE borrower_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM Reviews GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers WHERE financial_stability = 'Stable' ORDER BY borrower_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT r.rating, b.borrower_name, r.date_issued FROM Ratings r JOIN Borrowers b ON r.borrower_id = b.borrower_id WHERE r.rating > 4.5 ORDER BY r.rating DESC, r.date_issued ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT r.*, b.borrower_name, b.repayment_history FROM Ratings r JOIN Borrowers b ON r.borrower_id = b.borrower_id WHERE r.rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 AND b.financial_stability = 'Unstable' ORDER BY r.rating ASC, b.borrower_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT rv.review_id, rv.review_text, b.borrower_name, rv.date_reviewed FROM Reviews rv JOIN Borrowers b ON rv.borrower_id = b.borrower_id WHERE b.financial_stability = 'Stable' ORDER BY rv.date_reviewed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, financial_stability FROM borrowers;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_type FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name='Alice';
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount_paid >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 'b6045e5c-5f60-445a-b821-2325fa31229a';
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM borrowers WHERE financial_stability = 'Stable' ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_type FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT r.rating_id, r.rating_value, r.rating_date, b.borrower_name FROM ratings r JOIN borrowers b ON r.borrower_id = b.borrower_id WHERE r.rating_value >= 4.5 ORDER BY r.rating_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, financial_stability FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_history FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT borrower_id, income, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE income > expenses;
SELECT * FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name DESC;
SELECT rating_date, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE rating_value > 80 AND rating_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT borrower_name, financial_stability FROM borrowers WHERE financial_stability IS NOT NULL;
SELECT borrower_name, income, expenses, savings FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > income ORDER BY savings DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM repayment_schedule WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
